column2: wow! We ate here on May 26
column5: is THE breakfast spot in Chicago. You can wait up to an hour to get a table -- just build that into your plans -- but the wait is well worth it. This has the most extensive breakfast menu (they also serve lunch) I've ever seen. It is renowned for its pancakes
column6: loaded with berries of your choice. The egg-based breakfasts are excellent
column7: and the portions are generous. The crepes were fantastic. The service was HIGHLY attentive -- better that some fancy dinner establishments. Our waiter was Jesus D.
column8: and he ROCKED! All the staff hustle
column9: but you never feel rushed. We WILL be back. Highly recommended. Enjoy!
